titleStmt.title: The protestant father's advice to his ambitious son. To the tune of, State and ambition.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball in Pye-corner.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication and publisher's name from Wing.
Verse: "State and ambition, alas, will deceive you ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
